articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from PSG vs Arsenal in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: LIVE Champions League: PSG vs Arsenal - live text, score and updates

articles.description: Arsene Wenger proposes a change to the offside rule that would mean attackers are onside if any part of their body is in line with the last outfield defender.
articles.title: Arsene Wenger: Former Arsenal boss proposes change to offside rule after VAR effect

articles.description: Mikel Arteta believes timing is the reason Arsenal have not managed to win as many trophies as they would have liked over recent seasons.
articles.title: Mikel Arteta: Arsenal manager blames timing for lack of trophies in recent seasons

articles.description: India captain Rohit Sharma has announces his retirement from Test cricket at the age of 38.
articles.title: Rohit Sharma: India's Test captain retires from longest format

articles.description: US President Donald Trump says playing at the 2026 World Cup could be an incentive for Russia to end the war in Ukraine.
articles.title: Ukraine war: Donald Trump says 2026 World Cup could be 'incentive' for Russia to end conflict

articles.description: Those selected for the 2025 British and Irish Lions tour will rightly bask in their achievement - but it's only the initial step on a long journey, writes Tom English.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025: Making squad is just start of tests

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says winning the Masters will help him feel "more comfortable and a lot less pressure" at next week's US PGA Championship.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy: Masters champion has 'nothing but positive vibes' before major return

articles.description: No matches between India and Pakistan should take place amid the ongoing tensions after the Kashmir militant attack, says India men's coach Gautam Gambhir.
articles.title: India-Pakistan: No cricket matches until Kashmir attack conflict resolved - Gautam Gambhir

articles.description: Barcelona defender Inigo Martinez denies spitting at Inter Milan's Francesco Acerbi during the Champions League semi-final defeat.
articles.title: Inter Milan v Barcelona: Inigo Martinez denies spitting at Francesco Acerbi

articles.description: British number one Jack Draper says he is "feeling good" after arriving at the Italian Open in Rome following a short turnaround from the Madrid Open final.
articles.title: Italian Open: Jack Draper in Rome after short Madrid Open final turnaround
